preview_title: Images of smiling people impact more in your users
preview_subtitle: It is time for you to discover what images incite your customers to buy now
title: Images that work for another one, do not have to work for you
subtitle: Find out the images your visitors like
content:
Can you imagine not having to choose an image based on your own criteria without knowing if it makes your users click more or less?

Research if the type of image influences the decision of the user and which generates more impact. The ability to test images and choose which ones increase your sales is the beginning of a good optimization.

It is rumored that images of women or a group of people smiling convert more than any other type of photography. Or that the product-only images impact more than the ones that include the product in a context.

Imagine that we give you the option to try two types of images, the ones that you prefer, and you can analyze with data and in real time which of the two images increase your sales. Because you have the right to know what works for you.

How can you do it with Conver.fit in 2 clicks?

➤ [1 Click]
Launch your first A/B Test for your entire audience. For example, modify your cover image, that is the first image that speaks of your brand, your cover letter. Choose 2 different images and show 50% of your visits the image A and the other 50% of the image B.

➤ [2 Click]
Choose the conversion action you want to improve. If we are an ecommerce, the conversion would be finalize purchase.

DONE!
Bring traffic to your website and take a sit in front of your Conver.fit panel with popcorn to analyze, in real time, which image increases your sales so you can take a real decision about which type of image works best for you and your audience.

Welcome to the fantastic world of Test A / B, where it is the data that decide for you

What if we do an A/B test of product image in which the image A, for example, is the image of the particular product, and the image B includes the product itself and also a different one? It is probably that you will increase sales of these 2 products at the same time. PROMISED.
